settings.title: Settings
settings.exportDescription: Download a JSON archive of all your Ebeno Research account data.
settings.exportError: An error occurred while exporting your data.
settings.deleteDescription: Permanently delete your account and all your data. This action is irreversible.
settings.deleteConfirmation: Are you sure you want to delete your account? This action is irreversible.
settings.deleteError: An error occurred while deleting your account.
